newsitem.title: USA: Champion paper unit Q3 oper income $58 mln.
newsitem.headline: Champion paper unit Q3 oper income $58 mln.

text.p: Champion International Corp said Tuesday its paper segment reported operating income of $58 million in the third quarter compared to $419 million a year ago and $44 million last quarter.
The decline from last year was due to sharply lower prices for all the company's pulp and paper grades, the company said.
Compared to last quarter, results reflected higher prices for pulp and lower prices for newsprint and publication paper grades, the company said.
